text: The Sun is the soul of all. It is the king of the stars.
If the Sun is in the 10th House, the native will be extremely wealthy, powerful, and like a king.
If the Sun is in the 1st House (Ascendant), the native is scholarly but may have sparse hair and weak eyes.
Mars in the 10th House makes the native a commander of armies or a leader of thieves, effectively very cruel.
The planet with the highest degree is the Atmakaraka (Self).
